statements: UPDATE customer_data SET email_address='john.doe@example.com', preferences='{"notification":true}' WHERE customer_id=100
UPDATE customer_data SET phone_number='123-456-7890', address='123 Main St, City, Country' WHERE customer_id=200
UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_data SET email_address = 'jane.smith@example.com', address = '123 Main St, City, Country', preferences = '{"newsletter": true}' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Smith', customer_phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preferred_recycling_method = 'Composting', preferred_pickup_day = 'Tuesday' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_address = '123 Main St', customer_phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preferred_pickup_day = 'Monday' WHERE preference_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890', address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_id = 'e230afda-2544-4c52-b18a-3112e5d4f889';
UPDATE preferences SET recyclable_materials = '{"plastic": true, "glass": true}', pickup_schedule = '09:00:00' WHERE customer_id = '1d7541ec-02e7-47b7-8a77-774f0c9c0088';
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main Street' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE pick_up_services SET service_cost = 15.99, active = true WHERE service_type = 'Recycling';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET is_active = FALSE, preference_type = 'Weekly' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'Max', customer_email = 'max@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE preferences SET is_active = TRUE WHERE preference_type = 'Notification' AND customer_id = 102;
UPDATE Customer SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Preferences SET service_type='weekly', reminders=true WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Customer SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 'c1e39918-1557-4a44-8b83-2e3d2b5f8ccd';
UPDATE Address SET city = 'New City', zip_code = '54321' WHERE address_id = '7674a322-4d59-47db-9e9b-0b94f7efa8bc';
